attributes.action: Any ex armed service personal should automatically have full residential status
attributes.additional_details: They have served the country with the possibility of being killed. They should automatically be welcome to stay as most form families here. I think it’s a disgusting that they have to fight for that right , where they could be killed or permanently injured and still are not classified as a resident of that country they have fought for. Thanks
attributes.background: To give ex services or current serving personal Permanent residency or citizenship fee free

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321411
